AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Rchr_Dyedyarn_ClothType
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rchr_inspclothtype_id =(SELECT rchr_inspclothtype_id FROM Rchr_Qualitystandard where Rchr_Qualitystandard_id=@Rchr_Qualitystandard_id@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Rchr_DyedJobcard
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: RCHR_JOBCARD_ID = (SELECT RCHR_JOBCARD_ID FROM RCHR_JOBCARD WHERE RCHR_QUALITYSTANDARD_ID=@RCHR_QUALITYSTANDARD_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Rchr_DyedYarn_SortnoByJboCard
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Qualitystandard_ID in (select Rchr_Qualitystandard_ID from Rchr_Qualitystandard where rchr_inspclothtype_ID='436DBA61E1F04BACB00506D89C3408E7')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Rchr_Looms_Beams
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rchr_beam_id in (SELECT head.rchr_beam_id FROM rchr_beam head,rchr_beam_lines lines WHERE head.rchr_beam_id=lines.rchr_beam_id AND lines.status in ('KAD','RL'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Roll Numbers Data Inspection Ids
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: RCHR_INSPECTIONSHEET_ID =(SELECT RCHR_INSPECTIONSHEET_ID FROM RCHR_INSPECTIONSHEET WHERE RCHR_INSPECTIONSHEET_ID=@ RCHR_INSPECTIONSHEET_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: ValidataionOnJobIdsDirectwarping
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: RCHR_JOBCARD_ID IN (SELECT RCHR_JOBCARD_ID FROM RCHR_JOBCARD WHERE RCHR_QUALITYSTANDARD_ID=@RCHR_QUALITYSTANDARD_ID@ ORDER BY DELIVERYDATE ASC)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Completed Direct Warping Set Numbers
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Directwarp_ID in (select Rchr_Directwarp_ID from Rchr_Directwarp where status ='CO')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sort Numbers Based on Inspection Sheet
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Sort Numbers Based on Inspection Sheet
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Qualitystandard_ID=(select Rchr_Qualitystandard_ID from rchr_inspectionsheet where rchr_inspectionsheet_id=@rchr_inspectionsheet_id@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Data Entry Operator
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Employee_Id IN (select dataeop from rchr_inspectionsheet order by created desc limit 1)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: LoomTypeValidationInSizingBeam
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rcpl_loomcategory_id IN (select rcpl_loomcategory_id from rcpl_loomcategory where value in ( 'Cam(Picanol)', 'Cam(Toyata)', 'Crank(Toyata)'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: RCHR_PieceMasterPeriod
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_PERIOD_ID IN (SELECT C_PERIOD_ID FROM C_PERIOD WHERE C_YEAR_ID = @C_YEAR_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: RchrPermissionShifts
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rcpr_Shift_ID in (select Rcpr_Shift_ID from Rcpr_Shift where permissiondays>0)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Weaving Employees
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Employee_Id IN (select emp.Rchr_Employee_ID from Rchr_Employee emp join rchr_attend_prod_line proline on proline.rchr_employee_id=emp.rchr_employee_id join rchr_attendance_prood prod on prod.rchr_attendance_prood_id=proline.rchr_attendance_prood_id where emp.Rchr_Emp_Dept_ID='66D47FF649E5458AA856CE6FD53B321E' and emp.employeestatus ='W' and to_char(prod.fromdate,'dd-mm-yyyy')=@Date@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: InspectionDetentions
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Detention_Id IN (SELECT Rchr_Detention_Id FROM Rchr_Detention WHERE isinspection='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Rchr_Relay_Validations
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Mrelay_ID IN (SELECT Rchr_Mrelay_ID FROM Rchr_Shiftrelay WHERE rchr_shiftgroup_id=@rchr_shiftgroup_id@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Subdepartment Filters
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Subdepartment_ID IN (SELECT Rchr_Subdepartment_ID FROM Rchr_Subdepartment WHERE Rchr_Emp_Dept_ID=@Rchr_Emp_Dept_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sizing Employees
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Employee_Id IN (select emp.Rchr_Employee_ID from Rchr_Employee emp join rchr_attend_prod_line proline on proline.rchr_employee_id=emp.rchr_employee_id join rchr_attendance_prood prod on prod.rchr_attendance_prood_id=proline.rchr_attendance_prood_id where emp.Rchr_Emp_Dept_ID='B3585DA61FA143B5A41CB5541CECCE2C' and prod.fromdate=(select sizing.Sizingdate from RCHR_Sizingsheet sizing where sizing.RCHR_Sizingsheet_id=@RCHR_Sizingsheet_id@ limit 1) and emp.employeestatus ='W')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: RCHR_Roll Number Employee Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Employee_ID=(select dataeop from rchr_inspectionsheet where rchr_inspectionsheet_id= @rchr_inspectionsheet_id@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: 8 Hrs Shift Groups
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: RCPR_SHIFT_ID IN(SELECT RCPR_SHIFT_ID FROM RCHR_SHIFTLINES WHERE RCHR_SHIFTGROUP_ID='4A9C752FFA4840519EB6A78D22FC06A9')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Payroll Period Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rchr_attd_process_id in (select rchr_attd_process_id from rchr_attd_process attp where to_timestamp(@#Date@,'DD-MM-YYYY') between attp.startdate and attp.enddate or to_timestamp(@#Date@,'DD-MM-YYYY')+interval '1' month between attp.startdate and attp.enddate or to_timestamp(@#Date@,'DD-MM-YYYY')+interval '-1' month between attp.startdate and attp.enddate)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: RCHR_Vacent_Rooms
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: RCHR_Room.isvacant='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: LoomTypeValidationInLoomProductionIncentive
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rcpl_loomcategory_id IN (select rcpl_loomcategory_id from rcpl_loomcategory where value in ( 'Cam(Picanol)', 'Cam(Toyata)', 'Crank(Toyata)','Rapier'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: RchrSizedBeams
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_beam_id IN (SELECT Rchr_beam_id FROM rchr_beam_lines WHERE status='KAD')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: RchrEmployeeSettlementType
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Employeestatus in ('R','AB')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Preparatory Direct Warping Employees
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Employee_Id IN (select emp.Rchr_Employee_ID from Rchr_Employee emp join rchr_attend_prod_line proline on proline.rchr_employee_id=emp.rchr_employee_id join rchr_attendance_prood prod on prod.rchr_attendance_prood_id=proline.rchr_attendance_prood_id where emp.Rchr_Emp_Dept_ID='B3585DA61FA143B5A41CB5541CECCE2C' and emp.employeestatus ='W' and prod.fromdate=(select Warpdate from rchr_directwarp warp join RCHR_Dirwarp_Creel creel on warp.rchr_directwarp_id=creel.rchr_directwarp_id where creel.RCHR_Dirwarp_Creel_id=@RCHR_Dirwarp_Creel_id@ limit 1))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Permission Employees
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Employee_Id IN (SELECT Rchr_Employee_Id FROM rchr_employee WHERE (employeetype='Staff' OR employeetype='Semi Staff' ) AND rchr_shiftgroup_id=(select rchr_shiftgroup_id from rchr_shiftlines where rcpr_shift_id=@Rcpr_Shift_ID@) AND isactive='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Mending_Validations
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('MN')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Working Employees
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rchr_employee_id in (select rchr_employee_id from rchr_employee where employeestatus='W')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Resigned or Abscond Employees
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rchr_employee_id in (select emp.rchr_employee_id from rchr_employee emp where emp.employeestatus in ('R','AB'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Rchr_SizingSheetBeamNumber
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rchr_beam_id IN (SELECT rchr_beam_id FROM rchr_beam WHERE name='WEAVER' and status='IDLE')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Sort Numbers By Cloth Type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Qualitystandard_ID in (select Rchr_Qualitystandard_ID from Rchr_Qualitystandard where Rchr_Inspclothtype_ID=@Rchr_Inspclothtype_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Salary Structure Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Desigbasic_ID in ( SELECT desigbasic.Rchr_Desigbasic_ID FROM Rchr_Desigbasic desigbasic WHERE desigbasic.rchr_salarystructure_id=(SELECT rchr_salarystructure_id FROM rchr_designation desig WHERE rchr_designation_id=@Rchr_Designation_ID@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Roll Number Data loom no based on Inspection Sheet
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rcpl_Loom_ID=(select Rcpl_Loom_ID from rchr_inspectionsheet where rchr_inspectionsheet_id=@rchr_inspectionsheet_id@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Rchr_Join/Rejoin Type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Ref_List.Value IN ('J','RJ')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: LoomsDetentions
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Detention_Id IN (SELECT Rchr_Detention_Id FROM Rchr_Detention WHERE islooms='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: PreparatoryDetentions
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Detention_Id IN (SELECT Rchr_Detention_Id FROM Rchr_Detention WHERE ispreparatory='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Inspection And Quality Departments
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Employee_Id IN (SELECT Rchr_Employee_Id FROM rchr_employee WHERE Rchr_Emp_Dept_ID IN ('F5188764F4364FE1883C8CAD7A79B9A1','3E0BBD20425244B2AF888092FDC686D4', '39F04D4846204624AA87278D7D0869F5'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Preparatory Production Incentive Employees
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Rchr_Employee_Id IN (select emp.rchr_employee_id from rchr_sizing_beam beam join rchr_sizingsheet sheet on sheet.rchr_sizingsheet_id=beam.rchr_sizingsheet_id join rchr_employee emp on beam.rchr_employee_id=emp.rchr_employee_id where emp.Rchr_Emp_Dept_ID='
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Employee_Id IN (select emp.rchr_employee_id from rchr_employee emp where emp.Rchr_Emp_Dept_ID='B3585DA61FA143B5A41CB5541CECCE2C' and emp.employeestatus ='W')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: RchrExcludedBankSalariesEmployees
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rchr_employee_id in(select rchr_employee_id from rchr_employee where ispfapplicable='N' and rchr_employee_id not in (select rchr_employee_id from rchr_exbanksalpaymentsemp ep where ep.rchr_exbanksalpayments_id=@rchr_exbanksalpayments_id@ and (ep.status='Paid' or ep.status='PRCS' or ep.status='DR')) and rchr_employee_id not in(select l.rchr_employee_id from rchr_exbanksalpaymentsempln l,rchr_exbanksalpaymentsemp el where l.rchr_exbanksalpaymentsemp_id=el.rchr_exbanksalpaymentsemp_id and (el.status='Paid' or el.status='PRCS' or el.status='DR') and el.rchr_exbanksalpayments_id=@rchr_exbanksalpayments_id@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: RchrExcludedPaymentSalPayrollProcessEmployees
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rcpl_emppayrollprocess_id in (select rcpl_emppayrollprocess_id from rcpl_emppayrollprocess emppp,rcpl_payrollprocess pp where emppp.rcpl_payrollprocess_id=pp.rcpl_payrollprocess_id and emppp.ispfapplicable='N' and pp.rchr_attd_process_id=(select rchr_attd_process_id from rchr_exbanksalpayments where rchr_exbanksalpayments_id=@rchr_exbanksalpayments_id@) and emppp.rchr_employee_id not in (select rchr_employee_id from rchr_exbanksalpaymentsemp ep where ep.rchr_exbanksalpayments_id=@rchr_exbanksalpayments_id@ and (ep.status='Paid' or ep.status='PRCS' or ep.status='DR')) AND emppp.rchr_employee_id not in(select l.rchr_employee_id from rchr_exbanksalpaymentsempln l, rchr_exbanksalpaymentsemp el where l.rchr_exbanksalpaymentsemp_id=el.rchr_exbanksalpaymentsemp_id and (el.status='Paid' or el.status='PRCS' or el.status='DR') and el.rchr_exbanksalpayments_id=@rchr_exbanksalpayments_id@) )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: RCHR_Cutlooking_InspctionIds
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: RCHR_INSPECTIONSHEET_ID =(SELECT RCHR_INSPECTIONSHEET_ID FROM RCHR_INSPECTIONSHEET WHERE RCHR_INSPECTIONSHEET_ID=@ RCHR_INSPECTIONSHEET_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Rchr_Loomsdata_Idle_Looms
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rcpl_loom_id IN (SELECT rcpl_loom_id FROM rcpl_loom WHERE status ='IDLE' order by loomnumber)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: DirectWarping BeamNumbers
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rchr_beam_id IN (SELECT rchr_beam_id FROM rchr_beam WHERE name='WARPER')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: De-Allocated Employees
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rchr_employee_id IN(SELECT rchr_employee_id FROM rchr_employee WHERE isallotment='N' and employeestatus='W')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: LeaveType Validation
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rchr_leavetype_id in(select rchr_leavetype_id from rchr_leavetype where value='SL' or value='CL')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Employee Validation For Leave
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: rchr_employee_id in ((select rchr_employee_id from rchr_employee where ad_user_id=@ad_user_id@ and leavedepartment is null and employeestatus ='W') union (select rchr_employee_id from rchr_employee where rchr_emp_dept_id in (select leavedepartment from rchr_employee where ad_user_id=@ad_user_id@ and employeestatus ='W')) )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Inspection Employees
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Employee_Id IN (SELECT Rchr_Employee_Id FROM rchr_employee WHERE Rchr_Emp_Dept_ID='F5188764F4364FE1883C8CAD7A79B9A1' and employeestatus ='W')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Rchr Staff Employee
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Employee_Id IN (SELECT Rchr_Employee_Id FROM rchr_employee WHERE employeetype='Staff' or employeetype='Semi Staff' and employeestatus ='W')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Roll Number Data Roll No List Id
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Roll Number Data Roll No List Id
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Rollnolist_ID=(select Rchr_Rollnolist_ID from Rchr_Rollwisedata where Rchr_Rollwisedata_ID=@Rchr_Rollwisedata_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Roll Number Data Piece No list Id
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Rchr_Piecenolist_ID=(select Rchr_Piecenolist_ID from rchr_inspectionsheet where rchr_inspectionsheet_id= @rchr_inspectionsheet_id@)
